Package reactor.core.support

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Identifiable<ID>  
    MultiValueMap<K,V>
    Extension of the Map interface that stores multiple values.
    NonBlocking
    A dispatcher aware component
    TypeReference<T>
    Marker interface to provide generic type information.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Assert
    Assertion utility class that assists in validating arguments.
    CollectionUtils
    Miscellaneous collection utility methods.
    Exceptions
    Static Helpers to decorate an exception with an associated data Original design from https://github.com/ReactiveX/RxJava/blob/1.x/src/main/java/rx/exceptions/Exceptions.java
    IoUtils
    IO-related utility methods
    LinkedCaseInsensitiveMap<V>
    LinkedHashMap variant that stores String keys in a case-insensitive manner, for example for key-based access in a results table.
    LinkedMultiValueMap<K,V>
    Simple implementation of MultiValueMap that wraps a LinkedHashMap, storing multiple values in a LinkedList.
    NamedDaemonThreadFactory
    A thread factory that creates named daemon threads.
    ObjectUtils
    Miscellaneous object utility methods.
    SpecificationExceptions  
    StringUtils
    Miscellaneous String utility methods.
    TypeUtils  
    UUIDUtils
    Helper for creating random and Type 1 (time-based) UUIDs.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    Exceptions.ValueCause
    Represents an exception that was encountered while trying to emit an item from an Observable, and tries to preserve that item for future use and/or reporting.
    ReactorFatalException
    an exception that should stop producing more data
